full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 96 of 228 772 LC2Qmax3 Rocchio - Cross to the mic when you're answering? THE WITNESS: Sorry. Q. I think it's tab 18. Do you have a tab 18? A. Yes, I do. Q. And that's the study that we're talking about? A. It's one of them, yes. Q. That's the study you and I are talking about right now, correct? A. Yes. THE COURT: May I have it? MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, your Honor. Q. Tell me when you've had enough time to review that. A. So, if your question is: Was one of the vignettes used a non-grooming condition, yes. Q. Yes, okay. And those vignettes were given to these 393 undergraduate students to review, correct? A. Yes. Q. And they were asked questions about whether or not they could identify what you've called grooming behavior as grooming behavior, correct? A. So this was one of the predictive studies, yes. Q. Right. And so that's the question they were asked: Can you predict this as being grooming behavior, correct? A. Correct. Q. And these 390-some-odd college students who reviewed these SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012381
